metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9113 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: There is a NULL pointer dereference in function imagetobmp ofconvertbmp.c:980 of OpenJPEG 2.1.2. image->comps[0].data is not assigned avalue after initialization(NULL). Impact is Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
